about_box.profile.text: Young computer science student and beginner developer.
about_box.about_me.title: About me
about_box.about_me.text: My name is Clément Fossorier, and I am a student in computer science as well as an apprentice developer! I am currently studying in a preparatory year at the École des Technologies Numériques Avancées (ETNA) to obtain a degree in IT project management. Passionate about computer science and particularly development, I have mastered the basics of several programming languages, including Java, PHP, HTML/CSS, Python, and many others! I also invite you to visit this page to learn more about me and discover all my skills.
